body:
Hey, you guys ''should'' know me as Ludcha.

I'm 13 years old and i'm from Sweden. My best friends on this server would have to be Robin (Robin_DD_J) and Javipepe. 

I joined this server 2 month's ago and started playing regularly 1 month ago. If you wish to ask me anything about my family/friends and that stuff feel free!

//Luudchaa
